content: Hey @WG-rfc-2229 -- I was looking at your milestone due dates and wondering about moving the "impl complete" milestone from May 1 to Apr 1-- do you think that's realistic? In some sense, I guess, it doesn't matter, but I'd really like if we were done by then, to give us more time to fix problems.
We think it's realistic. We would also like to try to have the impl complete done by then
